document.full_text: the state house of representatives passed a bill allowing gay couples to enter into civil unions after an effort to turn the initiative into a bill that would allow gay couples to marry failed.
document.title: new england: rhode island: house backs civil unions
lines_and_colors: the state house of representatives passed a bill allowing gay couples to enter into civil unions after an effort to turn the initiative into a bill that would allow gay couples to marry failed.
